fields.summary: enhance error message: "Migrating instance i-ce0e95fd failed because of: ERROR"

comments.body:
Note: this path only covers synchronous errors where the system cannot even start migration, so the system should know what the cause of the error is.

Once a migration begins, we have no error reporting mechanism unless we implement a 'DescribeMigrations' operation into the system.
nevermind, it isn't a dup of EUCA-10753 after all
Need to fix this in 4.3.0 to help facilitate upgrade from rhel6->7 reliability when instance migrations are required for that process.

When no space left on NC, now client doesn't throw any error. nc.log throws the following error,

{noformat}
2016-06-16 17:40:16 ERROR 000015225 art_implement_tree       | [i-80bb5933] failed to allocate artifact prt-03072ext3-11384fdc (8 blobstore.c:3250 no space left) on try 1
2016-06-16 17:40:16 DEBUG 000015225 art_implement_tree       | [i-80bb5933] failed to implement artifact 153|prt-03072ext3-11384fdc on try 1
2016-06-16 17:40:16 ERROR 000015225 art_implement_tree       | [i-80bb5933] failed to provision dependency prt-03072ext3-11384fdc for artifact prt-03072ext3-11384fdc (error=8) on try 1
{noformat}

Please let me know if this is a different issue and should be opened separately.
[~shaon], let's have a separate bug for your issue if you don't mind. In your case migration is already started but can't be completed.
This issue is blocked by EUCA-12468. Should we also changed the fix version for this one?

Marking this as Fixed, since the changes are only related to return message.

Please reopen/create new issue if appropriate error message is not provided after the blocker issue is fixed.
